Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various commands, but all attempts failed with a "No such file or directory" error. I tried multiple commands using different conda.sh files located in various directories, including those located in /opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/, /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/, /home/kat. However, all attempts failed. I then tried executing a command to activate the environment using a specific conda file located in /opt/conda/bin/activate, but it returned a "No such file or directory" error. I also tried different conda files located in /home/katmai/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/ and ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/, but they also returned the same error. Finally, I tried using a conda file located in ~/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/, but it also returned the same error.
"""

Latest Development:
